name: FinancialAccount
comment: Contains the details of the FinancialAccount who is liable for debts and credits and also establishes relationship for payment responsibility and liability.
vf short description: Contains the details of the FinancialAccount who is liable for debts and credits and also establishes relationship for payment responsibility and liability.

fields.name: FinancialAccountSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: FinancialAccountKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the financial account in ALDM. Each financial account key value represents a unique financial account. Generated Key based on  Financial Account Id

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OpenDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which the account was created. FinancialAccount.openDate

fields.name: AccountingBalancePolicyInd
fields.comment: Specified the balance management policy that is associated with the financial account. An account can have any one of the following two balance management policies: - Balance Forward - This policy is applicable mainly for the accounts with bill-receiver billing arrangements. However, it can also be used for the invoice receivers. Received payments and adjustments are applied to the open invoice. This means that a credit balance for an account indicates that all the invoices are paid and closed for the corresponding account. - Open Item - This policy is applicable to the accounts with invoice-receiver billing arrangements, mainly corporate accounts. Payments are applied only to specific invoices. Otherwise, they remain in the account s unallocated bucket for manual assignment. This means that an account may be in credit but still have open invoices.Note: Balance management policies are relevant only for postpaid connections. //Customized per implementation.

fields.name: SuspensionTypeInd
fields.comment: Specifies the different sanctions that are applied on a financial account if there are collection issues.For example:- ALL= ALL - INCO=INCOMING - INTL=INTERNATIONAL - OUTG=OUTGOING //Customized per implementation

fields.name: ServiceProviderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CollectionInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the account is in collection phase. Values are: N - Not in collection Y - In collection T - In trial period //Customized per implementation

fields.name: FinancialAccountId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the financial account in the source system. FinancialAccount.id

fields.name: CollectionPermanentWaiverFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the financial account is eligible for permanent collection waiver. For example, special accounts such as accounts of government offices.Values are:- 1 - The account is eligible for permanent collection waiver.- 0 - The account is not eligible for permanent collection waiver. //Customized per implementation

fields.name: FinancialAccountStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: FinancialAccountConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: DocumentTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the invoice document received by the customer.Values are:I - Invoice ReceiverB- Bill Receiver

fields.name: FinancialAccountStatusChangeDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date of the last status change of financial account. FinancialAccount.stateDate

fields.name: FinancialAccountConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: WriteOffInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the account is written off. Values are: R - Normal W - Written-Off //Customized per implementation

fields.name: LatePaymentFeeWaiveFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether late payment fees should be calculated for this account or the account is waived from late payment fees. Values are: - 1 - The account is waived from late payment fees.- 0 - Late payment fees can be incurred for the account. FinancialAccount.waiveLatePaymentFee

fields.name: ExceptionAccountFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the account is an exception control account (ECA).Values are:- 1 - Yes- 0 - No

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was created in the source system FinancialAccount.createdOn

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system FinancialAccount.lastModified

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MainAddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MainContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CurrencySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FinancialAccountScore1
fields.comment: A placeholder to store the score associated with the financial account. //Customized per implementation

fields.name: FinancialAccountScore2
fields.comment: A placeholder to store the second score associated with the financial account. //Customized per implementation

fields.name: FinancialAccountSourceId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the financial accounts in the source system.

fields.name: FinancialAccountStatusReasonSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: FinancialAccountConvergedStatusReasonSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: CustomerTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSubTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: UserGroupSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CountrySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FinancialAccountName
fields.comment: The name of the account. FinancialAccount.name

fields.name: FinancialAccountDesc
fields.comment: A description of the account. FinancialAccount.description

fields.name: FinancialAccountType
fields.comment: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so on, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. FinancialAccount.type

fields.name: AccountType
fields.comment: The type of account. FinancialAccount.accountType

fields.name: AccountSubType
fields.comment: The subtype of an account. FinancialAccount.accountSubType

fields.name: FinancialAccountStatusIssueDate
fields.comment: The date on which the status was changed. FinancialAccount.stateIssueDate

fields.name: FinancialAccountStatusLastActivity
fields.comment: The last activity that caused the status modification. FinancialAccount.statusLastActivity

fields.name: FinancialAccountEffectiveDate
fields.comment: The valid time period start date and time. FinancialAccount.validFor.startDateTime

fields.name: FinancialAccountEndDate
fields.comment: The valid time period end date and time. FinancialAccount.validFor.endDateTime

fields.name: FinancialAccountCreditLimitValue
fields.comment: The credit limit for the account. FinancialAccount.creditLimit.value

fields.name: FinancialAccountCreditLimitUom
fields.comment: The UOM for the account credit limit. FinancialAccount.creditLimit.unit

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
